timeline.bodyText: if your using lombok then these setters / getters are not needed
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText: I haven't created unit test but if you remove getter, are you still able to create UT ?
replies.author: trixprod

replies.bodyText:
I'm not telling to remove getters
I'm telling to remove the getter code you have written by hand
lombok will generate getters for you - this is how the @Data annotation you have used here works https://projectlombok.org/features/Data
replies.author: walec51

replies.bodyText:
file name has a typo

Fixed all references from Transfert to Transfer ( without the 't' )
